subject: [WE-ADS] Reset Code For Your Password
body:
Dear <user>,

We recently received a request to reset the password for your WE-ADS account.
Here is your reset Code: <code>
Please enter this code on the password reset site to change your password. Remember, this code will expire after <expire> seconds.

If you did not make this request please ignore this email. If you have any concerns about the security of your account, please contact our support team immediately at <support>.

Best regards,
The WE-ADS Team
